For anyone weary of this yes it does actually work through the magnet link, no it's not a virus but MAN!!! IT TOOK EIGHT YEARS TO DEVELOP???!! WTF??
The creators are seriously attempting to break into the wrong industry!! It's a SLIGHTLY better version to the original, hardly warranting the need for a remake..
They weren't even making a profit off the game, for fucks sake. Fuckin' sega.

I am glad I could grab it before sega's pisstaking. The reason why they feel threatened may be that they are offering their old genesis games for sale on steam now. However, I don't know whether SORR is among those games or not.
Works nicely. Thanks for the upload you guys are gods.!
